asset-graph.description: System for building a searchable graph of files, enabling the creation of ML training workflows.

robots-make-tv.description: Real-time generative show that enables a 3-way authoriship dynamic between ML models, human/procedural directors, and a live audience.

ai-music-blocks.description: No-code tool for snapping together ML music blocks to form novel and dynamic soundscapes.

svg-plotter.description: Convert SVG files to GeoJSON for use in mapping software.

venue-maps.description: Find the best seats in the house for thousands of popular venues. Narrow your search by selecting sections or simply zoom in to filter tickets to visible rows.

fanxchange.name: fanxchange.com
fanxchange.description: Consumer site for Fanxchange's live-event marketplace.

unity-mesh-slicer.name: Unity Mesh Slicer
unity-mesh-slicer.description: Real-time 3D geometry bisection. Works with both convex and non-convex geometries.

akai-key-replacement.name: AKAI Replacement Keys
akai-key-replacement.description: Replacement keys for my friend's midi controller.

projects.name: Engagement System
projects.description: System for managing communications with patients and providers.
achievements: Rearchitected a large legacy system to improve development and operational velocity.
Led the team through the successful technical and operational migration.
Mentored junior engineers, fostering ownership and system expertise across the team.

projects.name: Database Optimization
projects.description: Query optimization to accommodate a large influx of users.
achievements: Diagnosed causes of high latency in mission-critical services under heavy load.
Developed a validation framework for benchmarking experimental optimizations.
Executed incremental zero-downtime rollouts of schema and query changes.
Delivered department-wide presentations on optimization strategy and guidance.

projects.name: RobotsMakeTV
projects.description: Experimental media combining human direction, machine improvisation, and audience interaction.
achievements: Designed tools for creators to produce narratives powered by machine intelligence.
Facilitated a unique weekly show with guest directors.

projects.name: Asset Graph
projects.description: Asset search engine for training Generative ML models.
achievements: Indexed over 10 years of production assets for the Crash Course YouTube channel.
Worked directly with the client to iteratively design and validate the solution.

projects.name: AI Music Blocks
projects.description: No-code tool for creating generative music arrangements.
achievements: Created a block-based interface to enable experimentation with ML-driven composition.
Worked with accomplished artists to align creative expression within technical constraints.

projects.name: Venue Maps
projects.description: Interactive seat maps for live venues.
achievements: Protoyped and launched an end-to-end solution for industry-leading venue maps.
Solution attracted Vivid Seats' interest, resulting in an acquisition.
Led the migration of the system to Vivid Seats' platform.
Optimized content authoring tools to help scale to over 30k venues.
Conducted migration of venue data from three large data acquisitions.

projects.name: Live Event Marketplace
projects.description: Marketplace for live events across North-America.
achievements: Collaborated with designers to rebuild an e-commerce platform from scratch.
Improved customer experience through A/B testing, user interviews, and usage analytics.
Developed a VR "View from Your Seat" feature for mobile shoppers.
